mapper.insert: insert into article(articleId, author, originalAuthor, articleTitle, articleContent, articleTags, articleType, articleCategories , publishDate, updateDate, articleUrl, articleTabloid) values (#{articleId}, #{author}, #{originalAuthor}, #{articleTitle}, #{articleContent}, #{articleTags}, #{articleType}, #{articleCategories}, #{publishDate}, #{updateDate}, #{articleUrl}, #{articleTabloid})
mapper.select: select * from article order by id desc
